meanings.definition: To live in a particular place
meanings.sent1: She dwelt in a cozy cottage by the forest.
meanings.sent2: They dwelt in the bustling city for many years.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel dwelt in the treehouse, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: Memories of her childhood dwelt in the old house.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of kindness dwelt in her heart.

meanings.sent1: The aroma of freshly baked cookies dwelt in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The song dwelt in his mind long after it ended.
meanings.sent3: The secret dwelt in her thoughts, waiting to be revealed.
meanings.sent4: His words dwelt in her heart, bringing comfort.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of the sun dwelt on her skin, soothing her.
